articles.title: Tributes paid to "popular" Southampton hospital porter who's died after testing positive for Covid-19 - ITV News
articles.description:
Tributes are being paid to a hospital porter in Southampton, who has died after testing positive for coronavirus.

articles.title: Doctors 'extremely worried' by 70 drop in York cancer referrals - York Press
articles.description: YORK has recorded a sharp drop in cancer referrals - sparking concern from GPs.
articles.content:
NHS Vale of York Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG) cancer lead, Dr Daniel Cottingham, told The Press that the two-week referral rate for cancer appointments across the city has fallen by around 70 per cent - in line with the national average.
